name: Ultimate Freelance Bundle
description: This ultimate bundle contains 4 epic resources to help you on your freelance journey.Your First Freelance Client - an eBook that explains exactly how to go from 0 to 1 as a freelancer and start earning money as quickly as possible.Proposal Template - a proposal template for Figma to help you craft high-quality, client-winning proposals faster than ever before.Invoice Template - a Notion invoice template that you can easily share with clients to receive payments easier.Contract Template - create
features: Your First Freelance Client - an eBook that explains exactly how to go from 0 to 1 as a freelancer and start earning money as quickly as possible.; Proposal Template - a proposal template for Figma to help you craft high-quality, client-winning proposals faster than ever before.; Invoice Template - a Notion invoice template that you can easily share with clients to receive payments easier.; Contract Template - create with confidence knowing that you're protected from any unethical behaviour with a simple, Notion-based contract template.
